mapper.insert: insert into fb_boardcomment (fbc_idx, fbc_gup, fbc_content, id, nickname) values (fb_boardcomment_idx_seq.nextval, #{fbc_gup}, #{fbc_content}, #{id}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: select count(*) from fb_boardcomment where fbc_gup = #{fbc_gup}
select * from fb_boardcomment where fbc_gup = #{fbc_gup} order by fbc_idx desc
mapper.update: update fb_boardcomment set fbc_content = #{fbc_content} where fbc_idx = #{fbc_idx}
